document_data.name: ''Invisible Blade''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Invisible blades''''' were a variety of [[enchanted]] [[dagger]]s whose blades could not be seen.{{Cite dragon/169/Bazaar of the Bizarre: A dozen deadly daggers from the FORGOTTEN REALMS}}
document_data.Powers: ''Invisible blades'' appeared as only a hilt, their blades being all-but invisible, making them easily concealable. Although invisible, the blade struck as a regular weapon, was always silent when it struck, and never reflected light. Only the wielder of the dagger could see the weapon's blade, as if they were using the ''[[detect invisibility]]'' [[spell]].
document_data.Creation: To craft an ''invisible blade'', the spells ''[[invisibility]]'', ''detect invisibility'', ''[[gaze reflection]]'', and a form of magical ''[[silence]]'' were used on the dagger as it was being forged.
